ticket.title: action mailer can't deliver mail via smtp (exchange 2007) on ruby 2.3.5
ticket.original-body:
I have a developer from external to create a intranet for us using ruby. The intranet will have option to trigger an email. We are using Exchange 2007. The developer used:
email_config = <<-EOF ActionMailer::Base.delivery_method = :smtp ActionMailer::Base.smtp_settings = { :address => ? :port => ? :authentication => ? :user_name => ? :password => ? :domain => ? }
But when they did testing the email trigger, the log will generated error: 501 5.1.7 Invalid Email address. I saw that the Mail from: sis@smtpdomainname.com in coding.
Please help
ticket.latest-body:
I have a developer from external to create a intranet for us using ruby. The intranet will have option to trigger an email. We are using Exchange 2007. The developer used:
email_config = <<-EOF ActionMailer::Base.delivery_method = :smtp ActionMailer::Base.smtp_settings = { :address => ? :port => ? :authentication => ? :user_name => ? :password => ? :domain => ? }
But when they did testing the email trigger, the log will generated error: 501 5.1.7 Invalid Email address. I saw that the Mail from: sis@smtpdomainname.com in coding.
Please help
ticket.original-body-html:
I have a developer from external to create a intranet for us using ruby. The intranet will have option to trigger an email. We are using Exchange 2007. The developer used:

email_config = <<-EOF

  ActionMailer::Base.delivery_method = :smtp
  ActionMailer::Base.smtp_settings = {
    :address => ?
    :port => ?
    :authentication => ?
    :user_name => ?
    :password => ?
    :domain => ?
  }

But when they did testing the email trigger, the log will generated error: 501 5.1.7 Invalid Email address. I saw that the Mail from: sis@smtpdomainname.com in coding.

Please help

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
